pages.text: veyesta`ciluneke bil`azabi veley yuhlife-llahu va`deh. veinne yevmen `inde rabbike keelfi senetim mimma te`uddun
vekeeyyim min karyetin emleytu leha vehiye zalimetun summe ehaztuha. veileyye-lmesir
kul ya eyyuhe-nnasu innema ene lekum nezirum mubin
fellezine amenu ve`amilu-ssalihati lehum magfiratuv verizkun kerim
vellezine se`av fi ayatina mu`acizine ulaike ashabu-lcehim
vema erselna min kablike mir rasuliv vela nebiyyin illa iza temenna elka-sseytanu fi umniyyetih. feyensehu-llahu ma yulki-sseytanu summe yuhkimu-llahu ayatih. vellahu `alimun hakim
liyec`ale ma yulki-sseytanu fitnetel lillezine fi kulubihim meraduv velkasiyeti kulubuhum. veinne-zzalimine lefi sikakim be`id
veliya`leme-llezine utu-l`ilme ennehu-lhakku mir rabbike feyu'minu bihi fetuhbita lehu kulubuhum. veinne-llahe lehadi-llezine amenu ila siratim mustekim
vela yezalu-llezine keferu fi miryetim minhu hatta te'tiyehumu-ssa`atu bagteten ev ye'tiyehum `azabu yevmin `akim
